transcript:
Customer: Hello, didi. Hello?
Executive: Haan ji. 
Customer: Ji Ayush ji baat kar rahe hain sir?
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Sir IndiaMART se Raju Prajapati bol raha tha sir. Aapne concern raise kiya tha kya 9696?
Customer: Haan, haan, haan, haan, haan. Ji bataiye kya issue hai?
Customer: Ek hai na mera ek dekho meri ek party se meri baat ho rahi hai na.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Aap ek baar mere ko ye bata sakte ho ki genuine party hai ki nahi hai?
Executive: Achha haan dopahar mein aapne call kiya tha na 3:00 baje mujhe yaad aa raha hai. Aapka call maine uthaya tha. Ji number bataiye number.
Customer: Us party ka number na?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Party ek minute ruko main bata raha hu.

Customer: 7942
Executive: 7942
Customer: 62
Executive: 62
Customer: 8167
Executive: 8167
Executive: Amit Mahalik na, Gurugram?
Customer: Haan Amit Mahalik Gurugram.
Executive: Hmm, registered to hai, rukiye.

Executive: Ek minute bas line par rahiye.
Executive: Aap kharid rahe ho ya bech rahe ho matlab?
Customer: Nahi main kharid raha hu main isse.
Executive: Haan ye 29 July ko register hua hamare sath matlab paid client hai aapke jaisa, thik hai.
Customer: Paid client hai?
Executive: Haan. Paid client kya ho raha hai?
Customer: Ha, to ye iski rate isne mere ko bahut jyada down batai isliye mere ko thoda doubt ho raha hai ki
Executive: Haan. Achha rate kaafi kam batai isne kehne ka matlab?
Customer: Haan matlab ha market rate se bahut kam rate batai hai aur jaise maine isse kya ek do cheeze puchi.
Executive: Haan. Jaise koi koi koi cheez thi jiski rate market rate hai ₹35 isne batai mujhe ₹55.
Customer: Achha. Aur haan haan aur aur ek ek jiski market rate hai ₹65 wo isne batai mujhe ₹54 to matlab aisa hai ki bahut jyada variation hai iski rates mein.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Party to original hai nahi hai kya hai?
Customer: Iska GST bhi hai, GST du main aapko?
Executive: GST aapke paas hai? Kya naam kya naam se hai iska?
Executive: Amit Mahalik naam hai iska company ka naam hai Amit.
Customer: AR Enterprises ke naam se hai kya iska?
Customer: Number sun lijiye 7942628167 yahi hai dusra hai?
Customer: Haan haan haan yahi number hai.
Executive: Owner ka naam Amit hai na?
Customer: Amit Mahalik aur isne apne firm ka naam bataya AR Enterprises.
Executive: Nahi firm ka naam iska Amit Mahalik hai. Firm ka naam Amit Mahalik hai hamare sath hamare sath.
Customer: Achha. Firm ka naam hai haan. Waise GST number hai ye dekhiye 06. GST to GST to mujhe dikh raha hai khair par ye isne firm ka naam bata rakha hai mujhe.
Executive: Amit aur kahan ka register kahan ka registered party hai ye?
Customer: Gurugram ka hai ye.
Executive: Pura address bata du aapko pura address bhi hai mere iske paas.
Customer: Haan. Ye hai ek second.
Customer: B30 Ashok Vihar Phase 2 near 16 Gurugram.
Customer: Ashok Vihar Phase 2 ka hai.
Customer: Chalo main ek baar isse karta hu aur baat karta hu dekhta hu kya hai. Kyunki
Executive: Clear baat kijiye ki company ka naam to kuch aur aa raha hai iska ha dekho ye matlab
Customer: Halaki iske khilaf koi concern nahi raise hai abhi tak jahan tak mujhe lag raha hai but
Executive: Authority to nahi hai matlab main bolunga kyunki company ka naam maan lo dusra bata raha hai ye dusra bata raha hai. Aisa bhi ho sakta hai ki naya company khola ho isne matlab wo purani ho aur ye naya matlab isse wo registration kiya ho. Iska iska jo iska jo email email aap dekhoge na email iska.
Executive: Rukiye main dekhta hu email check kar leta hu ek second.

Executive: Iska email hai AR Enterprises. AR Enterprises
Executive: .noidagmail.com haan. Ha ab wo wo yahi apne firm ka naam yahi bata raha hai.
Customer: Haan to aisa ho sakta hai ki ye jo hai na AR Enterprises ka jyada matlab purana firm ho aur ye wala isne naya khola ho thik hai. Jisse isne IndiaMART se registration kiya hai.
Executive: Achha to ye purana customer hai naya customer hai IndiaMART ka?
Executive: Abhi to ye to naya hai ye Amit Mahalik ye naya firm hai ye 29 July ko hamare sath juda hai. 29 July 2025. Kaun sa plan le rakha hai isne?
Executive: Same plan jo aapka chal raha hai MDC mini dynamic catalog MDC MDC ha mini dynamic catalog jo aapka chal raha hai same plan hai.
Customer: Thik hai main. Clear baat kar lo ki dekho ye pata hai ye kuch galat karega bhi na to iske khilaf concern aap raise kar sakte ho kyunki ye registered client hai thik hai.
Executive: Haan haan haan. Buyer supply team hamari hoti hai to inse clear baat kar lo jo bhi hai na.
Customer: Nahi apan jaise maan lo payment IndiaMART ke through nahi kar sakte kya?
Executive: Wo wali gateway band ho gayi hai paywithindiamart.com jo tha na wo 2023 mein hi band ho gaya.
Customer: 2023 mein hi band ho gaya. Ab jaise kya payment bada hai ₹47000 banta hai isliye.
Executive: Bada payment hai.
Customer: Haan ₹47000.
Executive: To isko bolo saman leke aayega aapke paas?
Customer: Are yaar leke jayega.
Customer: Door ki party hai. Door ki party hai. Chalo fir main aur karta hu ki bhai bilti bilti karwa ke bilti dalne ka bolta hu ki aap maal rakhwa do fir main haan fir main payment karunga kuch aisa bolta hu.
Executive: 10% ka wo de do baki chhod do pura mat do aap. 90% payment mat karo. 10% de do thik hai keh do baki maal utrega yahan pe main aapko pura paisa de dunga. Agar aap 10% de doge to baki ka de hi doge problem thodi hai. Hai na? Nahi aur aur aur usme usme jaise maan lo agar ye 10% mein dikkat karta hai to wo kaise recover karenge apan?
Executive: Kya leke jayega wo 34000 ke liye fraud nahi karega kyunki IndiaMART ko usne ₹33000 de rakhe hain kyun karega service uske download ho jayenge na koi fayda nahi hai wo karega hi nahi samjho. Thik hai thik hai thik hai thik hai. Company to band karenge na ye kyunki main recorded line pe aap se baat kar raha hu main bhi to hu. Haan.
Executive: Thik hai main fir ek baar isse baat baat karta hu main hai na. Thik hai thik hai band kar do. Ye wali band kar du aapki? Haan band kar do band kar do. Ek feedback mil jayega please yes satisfied kar dijiyega thik hai. Satisfied kar dijiyega. Haan sure sure sure sure. Okay sir thik hai thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer doubts the genuineness of a party.

- Rate quoted by the party is very low.

- Wants to know if payment can be done via IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive verified the party's registration details.

- Executive shared the firm's address and email ID.

- Executive advised to negotiate payment terms.

- Executive confirmed payment gateway is closed since 2023.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will talk to the party again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- genuineness, payment, registration, rates
